description.ko: 대지의 역사를 나타내는 지구의 질감과 지질층에 대한 상세한 연구입니다.
description.en: A detailed study of earth textures and geological strata, representing the history of the land.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of a tectonic fault line, revealing jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian, #D2691E red clay, and crystalline quartz veins glowing with internal heat. Detailed textures of parched soil and sediment layers carved by eons of geological pressure. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Lighting mimics the golden hour, casting long, dramatic shadows across the rough rock surfaces of #2F4F4F and #F4A460. Global illumination highlights the narrative of the land carved by time.
